Portal 2 это когда- Уитли, ну ты и сволочь, но я тебя прощаю. с:

Stuttering issue on Mac OS X for a few weeks now. Seen same issue all over the forum and internet. This game is not playable.

-Валера, кубы завезли?
-Нет, не завезли...
-Го картоху жрать?
-Го!
Nice
I still didn't get my cake.

Game is currently, as of 11.05.15, UNPLAYABLE if you own a Mac. Stutters and glitches every 3-5 seconds render it a very annoying experience, and Valve HASN'T MOVED A FINGER YET towards fixing it, just read the forums about it...

*** UPDATE: adding "-nojoy" to the launch options sorts it out and makes the game playable again... This game really is a blast, I've been playing for a few hours and held off on editing my review so that I could actually get into a groove with it (while some of you jacks were thumbing me down for owning a Mac, sh*t was like computational fundamentalism here and now...), and WOW.

This just "feels" right, great game.

*** UPDATE #2: Just binge played the last levels and finished it, one of the best games I ever played, belongs up there with OoT, SMW16, HL2 etc. Plus, this has to be one of the best endings to a game ever... I'M IN SPACE

And her voice just soothes me to sleep, I have a GLaDOS body pillow, nightlight, and even GLaDOS flavoured sandwiches. I look at nudie photos of GLaDOS on the internet everyday. I wish I could put a portal onto my front and back so she can slide through me, ooooohhhh hang on guys I'll brb just going to the toilet

Um jogo que muitas palavras seriam poucas para definir o quão brilhante ele é, as análises positivas não me deixam mentir...

Nesse jogo, eu não encontrei um único ponto negativo sequer, nada, absolutamente nada contribui para uma crítica negativa. Um jogo estonteante, com desafios fundidos a uma história que criaram um mix perfeito de emoções... nunca tive tanto prazer em resolver puzzles e muitas vezes realmente me senti uma cobaia da Glados, muitas vezes desejei nunca alcançar o final do game, pois meu corpo e mente anseavam por mais puzzles... e quanto mais eu tinha, mais eu queria.

Só um jogo da mais alta qualidade é capaz de provocar esse tipo de sentimento em um gamer, e portal 2 é um desses casos raros que provam que um jogo para ser "phoda" não precisa de gráficos, não precisa de cinematics e CGs, ele simplesmente precisa ser divertido e causar esse tipo de sentimento real a qualquer jogador.

Como se faz isso? Como a Valve fez com Portal 2!!
Jogue e descubra a fórmula secreta... não basta ser bom, tem que ser o melhor! hehe

20/10 - sem exageros: campanha - épica, modo cooperativo - épico, (dupla história, duplo desafio) história, personagens, diálogos, puzzles - épicos, possibilidade de expandir o jogo com fases da comunidade - épico!
我喜欢动动脑子，但是自己却没有太多的时间来玩，自己小的时候还没有出这个游戏时，自己曾经幻想过有一把时光穿梭的枪，可以打开时光之门，多年以后在Portal 2里实现了儿时的幻想，并且我相信当我老了，或者我不在了的今后某一天，这个幻想会在现实中实现。

I made a friend in portal, his name was Cube the Cubey Cube, unfortunatley I had to leave Cube the Cubey Cube behind on a a red button. 10.01 / 10. Would cube again.

Portal 2's player mobility and maneuverability are truly phenomenal; even it's graphics are far superior in comparison to Portal, the first Portal game. The campaign doesn't take more than a few hours to complete, a perfect amount of time in my opinion. The time truly varies on how quickly you can finish the puzzles riddled throughout the game; more than a few of these puzzles take quite a bit of thinking. Even the story-line is much more evolved and in-depth compared to that of Portal's.

Portal 2 even allows you to play user-made chambers, an incredible addition to the game. Some of the user-made chambers are even more complicated than the ones you'll find within the campaign itself.

I enjoyed 1 more. That's mostly because the last level in 1 was AMAZING and I have a lot of nostalgia and 1 came first and I wasn't expecting it, but no. Seriously. Portal 2 is more of the same, in many parts done significantly better. It's longer than 1, has more mechanics than 1, has a lot of old friends from 1 and is a very enjoyable game. I hear the multiplayer is good too, though I personally didn't enjoy it.

The fact is, Portal 2 is [strike]probably[/strike] definitely one of the most unique games i've ever seen, with physics unlike anything anyone's ever known, and graphics that'll knock your socks off. And then there's Puzzles galore! And who could forget the lovable charachters within, with GlaDOS, Wheatley, and (my personal favorite) Cave Johnson?
 99999999/10
Portal 2 will have a place in my heart and a spot on my hard drive forever.

传送门的科幻情节引人深思，游戏成功塑造了多个需要抱抱的反派，每个角色都性格鲜明，他们总是喜欢命令别人，利用别人，并且对科学(测试)疯狂地执着，不知道这个不关心人们死活的公司里的人是不是都有五险一金:)。也许不得不承认，在各种权力跟利益面前，这个世界并不存在好人，也不需要好人，最后能拯救自己的只有自己。玩到最后一刻感觉世界真美好，能活命真是奇迹，被困在这么一个地方真是日了狗了，前半段都有点怀疑 主角是不是患有斯德哥尔摩综合症。

Portal 2, ein Spiel mit Humor, Spannung und dem richtigen Grad an Schwierigkeit.

-Tolle Syncronisation
-Fordernde aber nicht allzu schwere Level mit viel Abwechslung
-Gelungene, humorvolle Story
-Tolles Spielprinzip

一开始我这种电脑渣爆的人是不敢玩这种大型3D游戏的，所以那段时间我一直沉迷在Kongregate的flash游戏里不能自拔，后来有一天我玩到了flash版的2D传送门，当时我就惊呆了，这传送枪好牛叉！
后来我用攒了半年的全部工资买了新电脑之后，有人给我安利V社的传送门系列，我才知道尼玛这游戏原版居然如此酸爽！
最后希望G胖学会数3。
